about_the_game:
A multiplayer horror escape game for 1 to 4 players.

Features

There are two modes: PvE (player vs. enemy) mode and PvP (player vs. layer) mode.

Each match takes 10 to 30 minutes.

Description.

The objective of the game is to escape from the area by completing simple clear conditions.

There are multiple monsters roaming in the area and attacking the player.

PvE mode: Can be played by one player, and players can cooperate with up to four other players to escape from the area.

PvP mode: The game is divided into player and monster sides. The monster side must use their special skills to stop the player from escaping.

The area provides items to help escape, lockers to hide in, and actions such as climbing over walls.

name: Escape Horror Online

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

short_description: A multiplayer horror escape game for one or up to four players, PvE mode allows you and your friends to work together to escape from an area. In PvP mode, you can also play as the monster and prevent players from escaping. Use your special skills to prevent them from escaping!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
